fields.name: Secondary School Scholars SSCE
fields.description: A total of ₦1,000,000 will be awarded to the best-performing students from Ekwulobia
eligibility_criteria: Completed WAEC/NECO in 2025 with at least 5 distinctions (A1–B3)
Scored 280 or above in the 2025 JAMB examination
required_documents: Short essay (100–150 words): Why I Deserve This Scholarship

fields.name: Best Graduating University Students
fields.description: In recognition of academic consistency, two prizes will be awarded to graduates from Ekwulobia
eligibility_criteria: Graduated from a Nigerian university in the 2024/2025 academic year
Must submit official certificate and transcript showing a minimum of Second Class Upper (2:1)
required_documents: Optional statement: My Academic Journey (100–200 words)
